Title: Relates to the procurement of locally grown farm and food products
Summary: Enacts the local food, farms, and jobs act; relates to the procurement of locally grown farm and food products; sets goals for levels of procurement by state agencies; creates the New York state council on food policy.
LawCode: Amd ยง16, Ag & Mkts L; add ยง163-c, St Fin L; amd ยง180-a, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, the state finance law, and the economic development law, in relation to procurement of locally grown farm and food products and codifying the New York state council on food policy
